name: escrow-demo
description: Executable demo showing full escrow workflow using @solana/kit

scripts.wait-validator: i=0; until solana --url http://127.0.0.1:8899 cluster-version >/dev/null 2>&1; do i=$((i+1)); [ $i -ge 30 ] && echo "validator not ready" && exit 1; sleep 1; done
scripts.start-with-validator: pnpm kill-validator && pnpm start-validator && pnpm wait-validator && pnpm start && pnpm kill-validator
